Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'That Narwhal appears to be a creation born in the times when bionic restoration was the craze.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'A few of them were released into the wild to be "domesticated" by nature, so to speak.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'But after some digging through the records...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Some functions of its body module and its underlying consciousness seem to be connected to M.I.N.D. research.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'But there is no evidence that this Narwhal has a consciousness similar to humans...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Well, there must be more to the story... Good.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "...Although it's not necessary, I have to remind you—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "You've entered the Arctic Route Union and will soon arrive at a medium-sized port called New Murmansk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'The remaining human forces there still have a lot of fight in them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "I'll eliminate anything that stands in the way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "As you wish. I'm just here to provide you with intel.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "What you've provided this time sure is interesting.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "Humans can't detect it, but as Ascendants, we can... Take another look beneath the ocean.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Even a conservative estimation would be over a hundred thousand...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I remember that according to our observation, the direction of the ocean's current has fluctuated significantly recently.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I wasn't expecting it to gather so many Corrupted in the depths of the ocean...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'According to the calculations, this wave of Corrupted will make landfall in... New Murmansk.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'It has sensed this, and it is trying to warn the humans...', 4: '1'}
